name: Kill Ball (itch)
description:
NOTE: For some reason, the music doesn't loop properly in the WebGL build. If it really bugs you, try downloading the Windows build.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

E: Turn around

Space: Jump

Esc: Close the game (in Windows)

In Kill Ball, you play as Kill Ball, an experimental military machine designed to be indestructible. However, there is one major flaw with the machine: it has a very poor battery life, starting at only 30 seconds. Thankfully, the battery life can be extended by chaotic means (i.e. knocking barrels off the stage).  For each barrel you knock off the stage, you gain 5 seconds to your ever-shortening time limit.

You must pass your final experiment: run through a tricky obstacle course and push the man at the end without running out of time or falling off the course. 

Do you have what it takes?
